DIỆP THỊ DIỄM MY 
               Feb 15th 1990 
Chung cư Celadon City, Sơn Kỳ, Tân Phú, TP. HCM 
Skills 
• 
Working under pressure, able to carry out multiple tasks 
• 
Careful, paying best regard to the accuracy in work 
• 
Having good communication and presentation skills 
• 
Having managerial and planning skill and good team-working ability 
• 
Careful, paying best regard to the accuracy in work 
• 
Computer skill: MS. Word, Excel, Power Point 
• 
Highly proficient in spoken and written English 
Experiences 
Mirae Asset Finance Company (Vietnam) Ltd 
Jun 2016 – Now  
Legal Specialist   
• 
Drafting and reviewing various agreements, contracts and other documents on a day – by 
– day in both of Vietnamese and English. 
• 
Giving legal opinions related to business for Manager, Korean BOD as well as other Depts 
as required. 
• 
Following up the litigation situation of the Company with Law firm.  
• 
Reporting to The State Bank including Operating network Report, Predicting inflation rate 
Report, Opening SIP, issuance internal policies…  
• 
Conducting legal procedures with The Competent authorities. 
• 
Updating legal documents, providing and interpreting opinions to relevant Depts. Drafting 
The Weekly Legal Newsletters in order to update for whole Company.  
• 
Translating and issuing internal policies for all Depts. 
• 
Training junior staffs of Legal.  
LawSoft Corp Company 
Dec 2013 – May 2016 
Legal specialist  
• 
Consulting and giving legal opinions on legal issues to customers by mail or phone. 
• 
Conducting legal procedures for the company. 
• 
Checking the legality of the contracts for the company and customers on request. 
• 
Updating legal documents and analyzing them and then writing Legal Newsletters and 
sending to Customer.  
2 
Alpha Law Firm  
Sept 2013 – Dec 2013 
Legal specialist  
• 
Providing customers with legal advices in different fields. 
• 
Conducting legal procedures in terms of enterprise, investment and nationality. 
• 
Compiling and keeping legal contracts and other legal documents. 
• 
Updating legal documents. 
• 
Working with Administrative authorities. 
• 
Assisting lawyers in legal proceedings.
